summary: Most requested features appear implemented: editable/persisted Dashboard title, new Notes page with LocalStorage persistence, new Tests page with LocalStorage persistence and per-test charts plus chart settings, and a Tests entry in bottom navigation. One key navigation requirement is not clearly implemented: adding a "Tests" entry in the hamburger drawer/menu (only "Notes" is evidenced).

missing_requirements.requirement: Hamburger drawer includes a "Tests" navigation entry that routes to the Tests page.
missing_requirements.reason: The modified hamburger drawer component (TasksDrawer) shows a navigation link for "Notes" but no visible "Tests" button/link in the provided diff snippet; only a handler function exists.

hallucinated_features.description: Live countdown timer on Dashboard updating every second (and additional derived UI data like "tomorrow" day/date).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-38 only requests making the Dashboard hero heading editable and persisted; a live countdown update loop and extra date calculations are not part of the requested changes.
